parameters.query:
-- Create or get conversation
WITH conv AS (
  {{ $json.conversationId ? 
     `SELECT conversation_id, total_messages FROM conversations WHERE conversation_id = '${$json.conversationId}'`
     :
     `INSERT INTO conversations (customer_id, customer_name, platform, category, priority, status, sentiment, customer_email, customer_contact)
      VALUES ('${$json.customerId}', '${$json.customerName.replace(/'/g, "''")}', '${$json.metadata.platform}', '${$json.metadata.category}', '${$json.metadata.priority}', 'active', 'neutral', ${$json.metadata.customerEmail ? "'" + $json.metadata.customerEmail + "'" : 'NULL'}, ${$json.metadata.customerContact ? "'" + $json.metadata.customerContact + "'" : 'NULL'})
      RETURNING conversation_id, total_messages`
  }}
)
-- Insert user message
INSERT INTO messages (conversation_id, role, content, tokens_used, response_time_ms)
SELECT conversation_id, 'user', '{{ $json.message.replace(/'/g, "''") }}', NULL, NULL
FROM conv
RETURNING conversation_id, id, created_at;

-- Insert AI response
INSERT INTO messages (conversation_id, role, content, model_used, tokens_used, response_time_ms)
VALUES (
  '{{ $('Save User Message to PostgreSQL').first().json.conversation_id }}',
  'assistant',
  '{{ $json.aiAnswer.replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  '{{ $json.aiMetadata.model }}',
  {{ $json.tokensUsed }},
  {{ Date.now() - new Date($json.timestamp).getTime() }}
)
RETURNING id, created_at;
